# Get the input
n = int(input())

# Check if it is possible to buy some cakes and some doughnuts for exactly N dollars
if n % 4 == 0 or n % 7 == 0 or n % 11 == 0:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")

N = int(input())

# 4x + 7y = N
# y = (N - 4x) / 7

for x in range(N // 4 + 1):
    y = (N - 4 * x) / 7
    if y == int(y):
        print("Yes")
        exit()

print("No")
